Architect/Software Engineer Mar 2015- June 2016 Digital Service Medicare and Retirement Solution Summary document for a new project was developed.
Provider Web is a web site residing within the SHIP Comprehensive Policy Administration System (COMPAS) with self-service features for providers.
When it was built 11 years ago, no enterprise-wide provider portal existed, so it was built into the Policy Administration system.
Today, there are better options, specifically, leveraging the UHC-wide Provider Portal, also known as Optum Provider Touch Point (PTP).
Our recommendation is to align to the enterprise standard by retiring the Policy Administration system Provider Web in favor of leveraging Optum PTP.
In addition, the Policy Administration system has an outstanding policy exception (PEX) with UHC Corporate IT for accessing the United Claim Processing System (UCPS) system directly in order to maintain information in the UCPS Provider Database.
To resolve the outstanding PEX issue, the Policy Administration system will integrate with ACES provider maintenance services in order to pass information between UCPS and the Policy Administration system.
